findings.title: ProcessTx will work with unconfirmed transactions
findings.description: The processTx function does not check if the minimum number of confirmation criteria is met before processing a transaction, allowing it to work with unconfirmed transactions.

findings.title: Unchecked Status Key in processTx
findings.description: If the number of confirmations are not enough, we are still adding to the pendingMints mapping and setting txsInformation[uuid].status to false. But we are not checking this status key while processTx is called.

findings.title: verifyTx function prone to repeated minting attack
findings.description: The verifyTx function is missing a mapping of BTC transaction Id => boolean which will mark a transaction id as already verified and minted. This will prevent minting for the same transaction id repeatedly.

findings.title: verifyTx function prone to minting for zero confirmation transactions
findings.description: Function verifyTx is prone to adding values to pendingMints mapping for the transactions with zero confirmations.
